folder.name: Printers - EPSON ET85XX
folder.description: EPSON ET85XX Templates - These are templates tuned for use on the Epson ET85XX printer.

folder.name: MPC Bleed
folder.description: MPC Bleed Card Templates - MPC cards have a 3mm Bleed along the outside edge.

folder.name: No Bleed
folder.description: No-Bleed Card Templates - No-Bleed cards are commonly available on Scryfall and other sites.

folder.name: Silhouette
folder.description: Silhouette Templates - These templates are for printing cards compatible with the Silhouette Cameo cutter.

folder.name: Multipage Batch Export
folder.description: Multipage Batch Templates - These templates support MultiPage PDF Exports so you can prep and print out entire decks and sets from a single set of files.

folder.name: Print Shop
folder.description: Print Shop Templates - These templates are for printers most home users don't have access to such as large UV printers.
